thread.section_title: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ingram's Water & Air Equipment | ingramswaterandair.com | 2 of 96
thread.title: Randy U
thread.title_full: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment reviewed by Randy U

author: Randy U
title: Randy U
text:
Good deal on scratch and dent item. Bought item on Thursday and shipped on Friday, the following week. Emails were unanswered, calls to sales person unanswered and not returned. Will probably buy from them again Just not when needed urgently
Customer service followup and K. really shows concern about me as a customer for past and for future purchases. Like I said, Great Prices and promised that my delays were being reviewed. THANKS FOR CHECKING ON ME!!! WILL DEFINITELY RECOMMEND TO FRIENDS!!!
